name: UNiagaraDataInterfaceSceneCapture2D
doc: Data Interface which can control or read from a scene capture component.

SourceMode: How should we find the scene capture component to use?
SceneCaptureUserParameter: When valid should point to either a Scene Capture 2D Component or a Scene Capture 2D Actor.
bAutoMoveWithComponent: When enabled the scene capture component will be automatically moved to the location of the NiagaraComponent with an optional offset.
AutoMoveOffsetLocationMode: Should we apply the auto move offset in local or world space?
AutoMoveOffsetLocation: Location offset when applying auto movement.
AutoMoveOffsetRotationMode: How we should apply the rotation
AutoMoveOffsetRotation: Rotation offset when applying auto movement.
